review: I am consulting doctor Harish for the last 12 years for my daughter (now 16yo) and son (now 12 yo).  He gives sufficient time and his diagnosis, explanation and treatment is very effective, he prescribes minimal medicine and as parents we are totally satisfied.  It is very difficult to find such noble and kind doctors these days (especially in big cities like Bangalore) who gives sufficient time and care to their patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is geniuenly very concerned about the baby s health and growth spurts. He remembers the details from every visit we make. Very kind and understanding doctor.
**** ************** Calm and Very helpful. Was also very good with my son who had a stomach bug at the time.

One of the bad experiences with this doctor. We met him for vaccine of my daughter. She was afraid to go inside the clinic. His assistant came and tried pulling my daughter, once I asked to leave my kid his assistant went inside. Later when I took my daughter inside doctor has not even took an attempt to make my daughter relaxed. They took her to table and gave her vaccine with brute force. I expect a better experience. I will never go back and will never recommend this kind of doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Harish is one of the very finest pediatrician that I have met. Visiting him since 1.5yrs ,both for my daughter and son. He has patience,and very friendly.He diagnoses the problem properly, will listen and explains the issue. Never he prescribed medication unnecessarily. We got all the vaccinations for my kids done by him.Thank you Dr. Harish for everything you do and being there always for us and hope the same from u.

Consultation experience was good. ** ** * **** ****** ******* **** ** ******* ***. I visited for my son as he was suffering from a cold, cough and required vaccination. The way of talking was good, he was friendly. Happy with the explanation of health issues given by the doctor. His suggestion and medicines were helpful to cure the baby's problem. I am satisfied and there is nothing to be improved. The doctor is very friendly and cooperative. I would recommend the doctor to others.

** ** * **** **** ******, consulted for fever and cold. He was listening to our problems and compared to other doctors he is better. His behaviour is decent, with patience he tells everything and asks everything it's better. My baby's pediatrician is Dr Harish only. The medicines he prescribed it helped my baby within 2 days. The baby was alright. We were satisfied with the doctor's treatment.
